entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Contrecoeur
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
